business_hours: Deskphone – Reception Desk (Front desk) Deskphone – Service Desk
phone_vendor: ATT Please port all number on the bill. 3 numbers.
texting_type: Main number called – Rings to Auto Attendant Thank you for calling Jubilee Pool and Patio for the retail store press 1, For the service department press 2, for hours of operation and location press 3. Thank you. Option 1 (Retail Store) – Reception desk and cordless phone at the same time and if no one answers goes ring to Service Desk and if they don’t answer goes to reception desk VM Option 2- Service dept press 2 – Service Desk rings if they do not answer it goes to Service Desk Voicemail Option 3 - For hours of operation & location – “We are located at 9908 County Rd 64, Daphne, AL 36526. Were open Monday through Saturday from 9AM – 5PM and closed on Sunday. During off season, our hours will be Monday through Friday 9 AM – 5PM and Saturday 9 AM – 1 PM. Off season will begin Nov 1 until April 1.”
after_hours_script: Where does a call go when it comes into your office? What happens to that call if no one answers? Will it be forwarded to another user or group of users? Do you currently have voicemail
reporting_needs: Dates / Timelines Direct Dial #’s – Be sure to go over installation process with client – Notate whether we are using their existing fiber and if they are getting new or updated fiber, be sure to let them know that it may not be installed with phones.  Let them know we will notify then when they are able to cancel all services.
